citations.narrative:
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2023, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st,
2023, was submitted on February 27th, 2024. In order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the
care and use of animals were followed, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live
animals in the previous fiscal year on or before December 1st of each calendar year.
Corrective measures had been implemented at the time of inspection. To remain corrected for all annual reports
submitted after July 19th, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Chair.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2023, which was due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 
2023, was submitted on February 27th, 2024. In order to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the 
care and use of animals were followed, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report covering the use of live 
animals in the previous fiscal year on or before December 1st of each calendar year. 
 
Corrective measures had been implemented at the time of inspection. To remain corrected for all annual reports 
submitted after July 19th, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Chair. 
 
 n
